channel.title: [java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection] "Please help"
channel.description:
OK so I got a problem in my java wich I tried but didn't find how to fix it so every time i run a source of this java error I must get those 10 errors.
[code] [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106 ) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(PipeImpl.java:122) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv iderImpl.java:27) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:133) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(WindowsSelector Impl.java:104) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo wsSelectorProvider.java:26) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:209) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:127) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co nnect [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Native Method) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp l.java:500) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja va:146) [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:78)
[10/22/11 1:09 PM]: ... 10 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
A screenshot :
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/azhoa1.jpg[/img]
So can any body help me, thanks. :)
*IK it's something in portforwarding but IDK how so...*

item.title: [java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection] "Please help"
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

OK so I got a problem in my java wich I tried but didn’t find how to fix it so every time i run a source of this java error I must get those 10 errors.

[code]
[10/22/11 1:09 PM]: Exception in thread “main” [10/22/11 1:09 PM]: java.io.IOExc
eption: Unable to establish loopback connection
